title: The amount of alternative facts hate on adc is hilarious

replies.body:

This thread has minimal constructive content and judging by the way the posts within have played out it shows that there is little merit to positive discussion here. As such I will be locking this thread.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [PB&M channel of the Moderation Discord here](https://discordapp.com/invite/zjUGbwD).

I had a game a couple days ago where i linked to an ahri as a full-tank braum. I tanked 800 true damage for her and was healed 1200 by the end of the game; she survived multiple engagements she would have otherwise died. Knights vow is strong, but it used to be VERY niche. 
Its suffering from the same problem that rylais did.... It used to be a situational item for a handful of champions, but after the nerfs to its competetors it became core on EVERYONE due to it suddenly being -stat wise - one of the best of its type.
I think the item was underrated and the cdr was an unneeded buff.

Invest 10,600 G on lifesteal
Enemy counters it by investing 900 G on {{item:3123}}

game knowledge and mechanical skill are two vastly different things. Im a jungle main. Jungle takes jack shit in the mechanical skill department. Game knowledge is like 90% of it.
I just read a thread that was about "junglers impact on the game is way too heavy"

**BREAKING NEWS FROM RIOT HEADQUARTERS! EXTRA, EXTRA! READ ALL ABOUT IT!**

This just in from _ALL CORNERS OF THE MAP, PEOPLE!_ Players on boards _tend toward overreactions!!!_ **CAN YOU EVEN BELIEVE IT!?!?!**

What's going to happen next folks?!? Catch our amazing story on Thursday:_ "Master Yi: Can't be slowed, or CAN'T BE KILLED?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!"_ It's a **STUNNING** tale!

I sincerely wish you people would stop pointing this shit out every time it happens to your class as if it's somehow new, or you're one of the only people in on it. What's this even to do with gameplay?

Clearly, ADC cannot 1v5 after they buy an item. Pretty much nothing can 1v5 short of that 1v5 being a setup. How dumb would you have to be to genuinely believe that? Seriously.

Of course they exaggerate. It's the internet; half these people aren't even legal to drink or drive yet.
